header.title: Insights
header.teaser: Trust and transparency are important for a good customer relationship. Here we want to provide insights into our work and a typical project workflow, so it's crystal clear what you can expect.

webtechnologien.subtitle: We have developed our own technology stack based on the Jamstack that makes everything simpler, faster and more efficient without having to accept limitations.
webtechnologien.absatz1: JAMstack stands for JavaScript, APIs and Markup and represents a modern architecture for web development. This technology enables us to create extremely fast, secure and scalable websites that provide an exceptional user experience.
webtechnologien.absatz2: The core of the JAMstack approach lies in the pre-rendering of content. Instead of creating pages dynamically with each request, all pages are already generated at build time and delivered via a Content Delivery Network (CDN). This leads to lightning-fast loading times and improved performance.
webtechnologien.absatz3: By decoupling frontend and backend, we can flexibly use the best tools for each area. The frontend is delivered as static files, while dynamic functions are implemented via APIs. This architecture offers several decisive advantages:

vorteile.sicherheit: Security: Less attack surface through static files
vorteile.performance: Performance: Global CDN distribution for minimal loading times
vorteile.kosteneffizienz: Cost efficiency: Reduced hosting and maintenance costs

webtechnologien.absatz4: Our JAMstack setup includes modern technologies like Svelte/SvelteKit for the frontend, TypeScript for type-safe development, Tailwind CSS for efficient styling and Netlify for deployment and hosting. This combination enables us to develop robust and maintainable web applications that are optimized for both developers and end users.
webtechnologien.absatz5: The Headless CMS integration via GraphQL APIs enables our customers to easily manage content while the technical complexity remains hidden in the background. This way you can focus on your business while we ensure a technically flawless and future-proof solution.

header.teaser: Tailor-made digital solutions for every need - from simple websites to complex AI integrations.
